Package io.sphere.sdk.products.commands.updateactions

Provides the possible operations which can be performed on update commands for products.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddPrice
    Adds the given price to the product variant's prices set.
    AddToCategory
    Adds a product to a category.
    ChangeName
    Updates the name of a product.
    ChangePrice
    Replaces a price in the product variant's prices set.
    ChangeSlug
    Updates the slug of a product.
    Publish
    Publishes a product, which causes the staged projection of the product to override the current projection.
    RemovePrice 
    final Product product = preparePricedProduct("demo for removePriceUpdateAction");

final Price oldPrice = product.getMasterData().getStaged().getMasterVariant().getPrices().get(0);

final Product updatedProduct = client()
        .execute(new ProductUpdateCommand(product, RemovePrice.of(MASTER_VARIANT_ID, oldPrice)));

assertThat(updatedProduct.getMasterData().getStaged().getMasterVariant()
        .getPrices().stream().anyMatch(p -> p.equals(oldPrice))).isFalse();
    SetDescription
    Updates the description of a product.
    SetMetaAttributes
    Sets the SEO attributes title, description and key words.
    SetTaxCategory  
    Unpublish
    Unpublishes a product, effectively deleting the current projection of the product, leaving only the staged projection.

Package io.sphere.sdk.products.commands.updateactions Description

Provides the possible operations which can be performed on update commands for products.
